description: Sedge (Carex phyllocephala 'Sparkler') is an amazing plant choice for a variety of reasons. Its bright green foliage provides a beautiful contrast to its golden yellow edges. It's easy to care for and maintain, needing only occasional trimming to keep it looking neat and tidy. It can also be used as a groundcover, and its broad clumps of foliage form an ideal ground cover for any garden or container planting. And its brilliant upright light green stems with branched seed heads full of tiny buds are just breathtaking. Sedge 'Sparkler' is a truly beautiful and distinctive plant that will add exceptional color and texture to any outdoor space.
